text: Ingar Andreas Nordlund Andreassen (17 April 1922 - 18 December 1998) was a Norwegian speed skater, born in Jevnaker. He competed in 10,000 m at the 1952 Winter Olympics in Oslo. ==References== == External links == * * Category:1922 births Category:1998 deaths Category:People from Jevnaker Category:Norwegian male speed skaters Category:Olympic speed skaters of Norway Category:Speed skaters at the 1952 Winter Olympics
title: Ingar Nordlund
